Verses: 1 yOdhaam, aagaaS, esEkkiyaa ennum yoodhaa raajaakkaLudaiya naatkaLil, morEsaa ooraanaagiya meegaavukku uNdaanadhum, avan samaariyaavukkum erusalEmukkum virOdhamaaith dharisiththadhumaana karththarudaiya vaarththai.
2 sagala janangaLE, kELungaL, boomiyE, adhiluLLavaigaLE, sevikodungaL; karththaraagiya aaNdavar thammudaiya parisuththa aalayaththilirukkiRa aaNdavarE, ungaLukku virOdhamaaga saatchiyaayiruppaarï¿½.
3 idhO, karththar thamadhu Sthaanaththilirundhu puRappattu varugiRaar; avar iRangi boomiyin uyarndha idangaLai midhippaar.
4 mezhugu akkinikku munbaaga urugugiRadhupOlavum, malaigaLilirundhu paayun thaNNeer tharaiyaip piLakkiRadhupOlavum, parvadhangaL avar keezhE urugi, paLLaththaakkugaL piLandhupOgum.

5 idhu ellaam yaakkObudaiya meeRudhalinimiththamum, iSravEl vamsaththaarudaiya paavangaLinimiththamum sambavikkum; yaakkObin meeRudhalukkuk kaaraNamenna? samaariyaa allavO? yoodhaavin mEdaigaLukku kaaraNamenna? erusalEm allavO?
6 aagaiyaal naan samaariyaavai veLiyaana maNmEdum, dhraatchachchedi nadugiRa nilamumaakki, adhin kaRkaLaip paLLaththaakkilE puraNduvizhappaNNi adhin aSthibaarangaLaiththiRandhu vaippEn.

7 adhin suroobangaL ellaam noRukkappadum; adhin paNaiyangaL ellaam akkiniyaal eriththuppOdappadum; adhin vikkiragangaLai ellaam paazhaakkuvEn; vEsippaNaiyaththinaal sErkkappattadhu, thirumba vEsippaNaiyamaaip pOgum.
8 idhinimiththam naan pulambi alaRuvEn; paRikoduththavanaagavum ammaNamaagavum nadappEn; naan OrigaLaippOla ooLaiyittu, aandhaigaLaippOla alaRuvEn.
9 adhin kaayam aaRaadhadhu; adhu yoodhaamattum vandhadhu; en janaththin vaasalaagiya erusalEmmattum vandhettinadhu.
10 adhaik kaadhpattaNaththilE aRiviyaadhEyungaL. azhavE vENdaam; pedhapraavilE puzhudhiyil puraLu.
11 saappeeril kudiyirukkiRavaLE, vetkaththudan ammaNamaai appaalE pO; saayanaanil kudiyirukkiRavan veLiyE varuvadhillai; pedhEsElin pulambal ungaLukku adaikkalamaayiraadhu.
12 maarOththil kudiyirukkiRavaL nanmai varumendru edhirpaarththirundhaaL; aanaalum theemai karththaridaththilirundhu erusalEmin vaasalvaraikkum vandhadhu.
13 laageesil kudiyirukkiRavaLE, vEgamaana kudhiraigaLai radhaththilE poottu; neeyE seeyOn kumaaraththiyin paavaththukkuk kaaraNi; unnidaththil iSravElin paadhagangaL kaaNappattadhu.
14 aagaiyaal mOrshEkkaaththinidaththil unakku irukkiRadhaik koduththuviduvaai; akseepin veedugaL iSravElin raajaakkaLukku abaththamaaippOgum.
15 marEshaavil kudiyirukkiRavaLE, unakku innum oru sudhandharavaaLiyai varappaNNuvEn; avan iSravElin magimaiyaagiya adhullaammattum varuvaan.
16 unakku arumaiyaana un piLLaigaLinimiththam nee un thalaiyai siraiththu mottaiyittukkoL; kazhugaippOla muzhumottaiyaayiru, avargaL unnaivittu siRaippattuppOgiRaargaL.
